title: Modern Escape near Sydney Olympic Park with Rooftop Swimming Pool & City Skyline Views
description: Be within steps of Burwood’s main shopping district and historic memorials at the Crowne Plaza Sydney Burwood, an IHG Hotel, conveniently located within 30 minutes of the CBD and 15 minutes from Olympic Park. With contemporary décor and delectable dining options, the hotel is the ideal launchpad for you to explore the burgeoning suburb. Take a relaxing stroll around the verdant Burwood Park to reach the Burwood War Memorial, before a coffee break at any of the ubiquitous cafés and a visit to Burwood Chinatown. For an exciting evening, head to the vibrant city to visit world-famous landmarks, unique street murals and award-winning restaurants and bars, where a gastronomic journey awaits you.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Sydney Burwood, an IHG Hotel
